_source.text: A clinical trial of trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole as a less expensive alternative for treating toxoplasmosis was presented, however it was not found to be better than pyrimethamine-sulfadiazine.

text: A clinical trial of **trimethoprim**-**sulfamethoxazole** as a less expensive alternative for treating
toxoplasmosis was presented, however it was not found to be **better** **than** pyrimethamine-sulfadiazine.
